bibl.title: A Note on the Augustal Prefect of Egypt.
bibl.note: Interpretation of the evidence concerning the creation of the Augustal Prefecture (first explicitly mentioned in 382) and the Egyptian diocese (first explicitly mentioned in 381).
bibl.seg: ERRINGTON R. Malcolm, A Note on the Augustal Prefect of Egypt.
Interpretation of the evidence concerning the creation of the Augustal Prefecture (first explicitly mentioned in 382) and the Egyptian diocese (first explicitly mentioned in 381).
